 2008-14982008-08-26,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of YVES LABERGE of Quebec, Quebec, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
